name: nativescript-bottom-navigation
description: Nativescript plugin to add a bottom navigation component for Android & iOS

scripts.build: npm i && tsc && tns plugin build && npm run ngc
scripts.test.android: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run ci.tslint && cd ../demo && tns build android && tns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.angular.android: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run ci.tslint && cd ../demo-angular && tns build android && tns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run ci.tslint && cd ../demo && tns build ios && tns test ios --justlaunch
scripts.test.angular.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run ci.tslint && cd ../demo-angular && tns build ios && tns test ios --justlaunch
scripts.plugin.link: npm link && cd ../demo && npm link nativescript-bottom-navigation && cd ../src
scripts.plugin.angular.link: npm link && cd ../demo-angular && npm link nativescript-bottom-navigation && cd ../src
scripts.demo.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run ios --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.angular.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo-angular && tns run ios --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.android: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.angular.android: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo-angular && tns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-bottom-navigation && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.plugin.angular.prepare: npm run build && cd ../demo-angular && tns plugin remove nativescript-bottom-navigation && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: cd ../demo && rimraf hooks node_modules platforms && cd ../src && rimraf node_modules && npm run plugin.link
scripts.clean.angular: cd ../demo-angular && rimraf hooks node_modules platforms && cd ../src && rimraf node_modules && npm run plugin.link
